abilities.name: Amy Aegis
abilities.description: A focused technique that grants Invigorated status, improving combat effectiveness through disciplined execution.

abilities.name: Amy Ascendant
abilities.description: Creates a Encouraged field. Allied units in the field gain status bonuses and reduced cooldowns when abilities are used.

abilities.name: Cait's Resolve
abilities.description: A signature move that amplifies presence and control without referencing origins.
